tasks.title: HotCopper scraper
tasks.description: Web scraper for HotCopper forum posts and announcements
tasks.details: Built scraper to pull forum posts from HotCopper. Handles pagination, rate limiting, and stores raw HTML for processing.

tasks.title: PDF classifier
tasks.description: ML classifier for ASX announcement PDF types
tasks.details: Classifies PDFs into categories: 5B, drill results, feasibility, capital raise, etc. Uses keyword matching and structure analysis.

tasks.title: Appendix 5B extractor
tasks.description: Extract quarterly cashflow data from Appendix 5B filings
tasks.details: Parses Appendix 5B PDFs to extract cash receipts, payments, and net cashflow figures into structured data.

tasks.title: Drill results extractor
tasks.description: Parse drill results from ASX announcements
tasks.details: Extracts drill hole IDs, depths, intercepts, and grades from announcement PDFs. Handles multiple table formats.

tasks.title: Feasibility study extractor
tasks.description: Extract key metrics from feasibility studies
tasks.details: Pulls NPV, IRR, AISC, mine life, capex and other key metrics from PFS/DFS/BFS documents.

tasks.title: Unified pipeline orchestrator
tasks.description: Orchestrates the full announcement processing pipeline
tasks.details: Coordinates download → classify → extract → store workflow. Handles retries, logging, and parallel processing.

tasks.title: SQLite database + schema
tasks.description: Database schema and ORM for all extracted data
tasks.details: SQLite DB with tables for announcements, extractions, tickers, prices. Includes migrations and query helpers.

tasks.title: Daily briefing generator + cron job
tasks.details: Generates daily summary of new announcements, price movements, and key events. Runs via cron at 7am AEST.

tasks.title: Price/volume tracker + impact scoring
tasks.description: Track price and volume changes with announcement impact correlation
tasks.details: Uses yfinance to track price/volume. Scores announcement impact by correlating price moves within 24-48h window.

tasks.title: Watchlist expansion (33 tickers)
tasks.description: Expanded watchlist from initial set to 33 ASX tickers
tasks.details: Curated watchlist of 33 ASX mining/exploration tickers based on market cap, activity, and sector coverage.

tasks.title: Briefing polish (dedup, filtering, formatting)
tasks.description: Improved briefing quality with deduplication and formatting
tasks.details: Added dedup logic, relevance filtering, and clean markdown formatting to daily briefings.

tasks.title: Bulk backfill
tasks.details: 300 announcements processed across TMS, MEK, SMI

tasks.title: Resource estimate (MRE) extractor
tasks.description: Extract JORC resource estimates from announcements
tasks.details: Built extract_mre.py — extracts tonnage, grades, classifications from resource tables. Tested on sample files, integrated into pipeline.

tasks.title: Capital raise extractor
tasks.description: Extract capital raise details from placement/SPP announcements
tasks.details: Built extract_capital_raise.py — 7 key fields (price, shares, total, discount, use of funds, managers, type). Tested across 48 PDFs.

tasks.title: Appendix 3Y extractor
tasks.description: Extract director interest changes from Appendix 3Y filings
tasks.details: Built extract_3y.py — 14 fields, tested on 2 PDFs (West Wits, Many Peaks). Integrated into pipeline.

tasks.title: Company profile generator
tasks.description: Auto-generate company profiles from extracted data
tasks.details: Sub-agent building profile generator — aggregates cash, drilling, resources, announcements per ticker.

tasks.title: Reddit problem scraper
tasks.description: Scrape Reddit for common developer pain points and API ideas
tasks.details: Built reddit_scraper.py — scraped 7 subreddits (140 posts), scored pain signals, output ready for API Factory prioritization.

tasks.title: JSON formatter proof of concept
tasks.description: Build PoC for a hosted JSON formatting/validation API
tasks.details: Built FastAPI app with format/validate/minify/transform endpoints, HTML UI, all tests passing.
